author: John Doe
testimonial: Furqan is a very talented developer. He is a great team player and has a keen eye for detail. I would recommend him to anyone looking for a great developer.

author: Jane Smith
relation: Project Manager at another great company
testimonial: I had the pleasure of working with Furqan on a complex project. He is a true professional and a great person to work with. I would be happy to work with him again.
